    • Constructor Detail

      • PID

        public PID(double p,
           double i,
           double d,
           double min,
           double max,
           double rate,
           double tolerance,
           double iCap)
        Constructs a new PID loop.
        Parameters:
        p - The P constant
        i - The I constant
        d - The D constant
        min - The absolute value minimum value that can be returned
        max - The absolute value maximum value that can be returned
        rate - The maximum increase that can occur in one cycle
        tolerance - The tolerance around the destination value within which the PID loop should stop.
        iCap - The cap for how big the I value can grow.

    • Method Detail

      • setPID

        public void setPID(double p,
                   double i,
                   double d)
        Changes the PID constants.
        Parameters:
        p - The new P constant
        i - The new I constant
        d - The new D constant

      • compute

        public double compute(double error)
        Computes the output for a given error.
        Parameters:
        error - The error
        Returns:
        The output of the PID calculation
